abstract: CBS has asked a federal court to stop ABC’s show, “Glass House,” from going on the air this summer.
snippet: CBS has asked a federal court to stop ABC’s show, “Glass House,” from going on the air this summer.
lead_paragraph: 6:58 p.m. | Updated CBS followed up on its threat against ABC with a lawsuit asking the court to block a proposed ABC series called “Glass House” because of its similarities to the long-running CBS summer series “Big Brother.”

headline.main: CBS Sues ABC Over Show It Says Copies ‘Big Brother’
